languages.text: "На моем мире-корабле все придерживались простой традиции — можешь ступать куда угодно, если того требует Путь. И лишь в святыни было не дозволено ступать каждому. Разве в этой комнате есть что-то святое, элантах?" {n}Ирлиэт обводит взглядом кабинет.{/n} "Я так не думаю".

"On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
languages.original_text: "На моем мире-корабле все придерживались простой традиции — можешь ступать куда угодно, если того требует Путь. И лишь в святыни было не дозволено ступать каждому. Разве в этой комнате есть что-то святое, элантах?" {n}Ирлиэт обводит взглядом кабинет.{/n} "Я так не думаю".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone on my Craftworld followed a simple tradition — you may set your foot whenever, if your Path requires you to. The only exception were the sacred grounds. Is there anything sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everyone on my Craftworld followed a simple tradition — you may set your foot whenever, if your Path requires you to. The only exception were the sacred grounds. Is there anything sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “在我们的方舟世界，只有一条简单的规则：你可以踏上道途指引的任何地方，只有圣所除外。这个房间看起来哪里像圣所了，外界人？”{n}伊莉耶特环顾四周。{/n}“我一点儿都看不出来。”
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: “在我们的方舟世界，只有一条简单的规则：你可以踏上道途指引的任何地方，只有圣所除外。这个房间看起来哪里像圣所了，外界人？”{n}伊莉耶特环顾四周。{/n}“我一点儿都看不出来。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «En mi mundo astronave todos observábamos una sencilla costumbre: puedes poner pie allí donde lo requiera tu senda. La única excepción a esta norma eran los recintos sagrados. ¿Hay algo sagrado en esta habitación, elantach?». {n}Yrliet inspecciona el cuarto con la mirada.{/n} «A mí me parece que no».
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: «En mi mundo astronave todos observábamos una sencilla costumbre: puedes poner pie allí donde lo requiera tu senda. La única excepción a esta norma eran los recintos sagrados. ¿Hay algo sagrado en esta habitación, elantach?». {n}Yrliet inspecciona el cuarto con la mirada.{/n} «A mí me parece que no».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Dans mon vaisseau-monde, nous observions une coutume simple : on peut se rendre partout où on le souhaite, tant que c'est la Voie qui nous guide. La seule exception concernait les terres sacrées. Y a-t-il quelque chose de sacré dans cette pièce, elantach ? Je n'en ai pas l'impression, » {n}ajoute-t-elle en observant la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: « Dans mon vaisseau-monde, nous observions une coutume simple : on peut se rendre partout où on le souhaite, tant que c'est la Voie qui nous guide. La seule exception concernait les terres sacrées. Y a-t-il quelque chose de sacré dans cette pièce, elantach ? Je n'en ai pas l'impression, » {n}ajoute-t-elle en observant la pièce.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Auf meinem Weltenschiff hatten wir einen simplen Brauch – jeder darf seinen Fuß hinsetzen, wohin sein Pfad ihn führt. Die einzige Ausnahme davon bildete heiliger Boden. Gibt es etwas Heiliges in diesem Raum, Elantach?" {n}Yrliet blickt sich um.{/n} "Ich glaube nicht."
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: "Auf meinem Weltenschiff hatten wir einen simplen Brauch – jeder darf seinen Fuß hinsetzen, wohin sein Pfad ihn führt. Die einzige Ausnahme davon bildete heiliger Boden. Gibt es etwas Heiliges in diesem Raum, Elantach?" {n}Yrliet blickt sich um.{/n} "Ich glaube nicht."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の方舟では、誰もが単純な習慣を守っていた。己の進む道が必要とする場所なら、それがどこであれ足を踏み入れても構わない。聖地はこの規則の唯一の例外だった。この部屋には何か神聖なものがあるのか、エランタ？」{n}ユリエットは部屋を見回す。{/n}「そうは思えないが」
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: 「我の方舟では、誰もが単純な習慣を守っていた。己の進む道が必要とする場所なら、それがどこであれ足を踏み入れても構わない。聖地はこの規則の唯一の例外だった。この部屋には何か神聖なものがあるのか、エランタ？」{n}ユリエットは部屋を見回す。{/n}「そうは思えないが」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Gemidünyamda hepimizin uyguladığı basit bir gelenek vardır. Yolun seni nereye götürürse oraya gidebilirsin. Kutsal bölgeler, bu kuralın tek istisnasıdır. Bu odada kutsal bir şey mi var elantach?" {n}Yrliet, odaya göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "On my craftworld, we all held to a simple custom — you may set your foot wherever your Path requires. Sacred ground was the only exception to this rule. Is there something sacred in this room, elantach?" {n}Yrliet looks around the room.{/n} "I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: "Benim gemidünyamda hepimizin uyguladığı basit bir gelenek vardır. Yolun seni nereye götürürse oraya gidebilirsin. Kutsal bölgeler, bu kuralın tek istisnasıdır. Bu odada kutsal bir şey mi var elantach?" {n}Yrliet odaya göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
